newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Novartis expects to post flat 1996 profit.
newsitem.headline: Novartis expects to post flat 1996 profit.

text.p: Novartis AG said that, excluding one-off merger-related exceptional income and expenses, it expects net income for 1996 as a whole to be approximately at the same level as the previous year.
Novartis was formed by the merger of Ciba-Geigy AG and Sandoz AG. Their combined net income for 1995 was 4.2 billion Swiss francs.
The company said that it will publish its financial statements for 1996 on March 18.
